mapper.select: select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' order by sortno
select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' and menulevel=1
select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' and menulevel=1 and appid=#{appid}
select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' order by sortno limit #{begin}, #{rows}
select count(1) from portal_menu where delflag='0'
select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu WHERE delflag='0' and parentid = #{parentid} order by sortno

select count(1) from portal_menu where ID IN ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id, parentid, IF(FIND_IN_SET(parentid, @pids) > 0, @pids := CONCAT(@pids, ',', id), 0) pids FROM portal_menu, (SELECT @pids := #{parentid}) var WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parentid, @pids) > 0 ) tmp ) AND ID != #{parentid} and delflag='0'
select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' and appid=#{appid} and menulevel=1 order by sortno
mapper.insert: INSERT portal_menu(menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark, createtime, creator, delflag) VALUES(#{menuno}, #{menuname}, #{parentid}, #{menulevel}, #{menuurl}, #{appid}, #{sortno}, #{menutype}, #{remark}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{delflag})
mapper.select: select id, menuno, menuname, parentid, menulevel, menuurl, appid, sortno, menutype, remark from portal_menu where delflag='0' and homeurl is not null and homeurl!=''
